languages.text: Похоже, недавно на Идексе произошел крупный переворот. Одна из аристократических семей взяла в руки власть, отправив прежнюю династию в опалу. В подобных интригах нет ничего необычного — разве что под новым правительством Идекс стал менее благополучен.

It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.
languages.original_text: Похоже, недавно на Идексе произошел крупный переворот. Одна из аристократических семей взяла в руки власть, отправив прежнюю династию в опалу. В подобных интригах нет ничего необычного — разве что под новым правительством Идекс стал менее благополучен.

traits.locale_text: It appears Idex recently saw a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are par for the course — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

It appears Idex recently saw a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are par for the course — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are par for the course — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are par for the course — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

languages.text: Offenbar ist es auf Idex kürzlich zu einem Staatsstreich gekommen. Eine der Adelsfamilien hat die Macht an sich gerissen und die ehemalige Dynastie verbannt. Solche Intrigen sind nichts Ungewöhnliches, doch Idex hat unter der neuen Regierung an Wohlstand eingebüßt.
languages.original_text: It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

traits.locale_text: Offenbar ist es auf Idex kürzlich zu einem Staatsstreich gekommen. Eine der Adelsfamilien hat die Macht an sich gerissen und die ehemalige Dynastie verbannt. Solche Intrigen sind nichts Ungewöhnliches, doch Idex hat unter der neuen Regierung an Wohlstand eingebüßt.

languages.text: Vous apprenez qu'un important coup d'État a récemment eu lieu sur Idex. L'une de ses familles nobles s'est emparée du pouvoir et a fait de l'ancienne dynastie des parias. Les manœuvres de ce genre ne sont pas rares, mais dans ce cas précis, la prospérité de la planète a décliné sous son nouveau gouvernement.
languages.original_text: It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

traits.locale_text: Vous apprenez qu'un important coup d'État a récemment eu lieu sur Idex. L'une de ses familles nobles s'est emparée du pouvoir et a fait de l'ancienne dynastie des parias. Les manœuvres de ce genre ne sont pas rares, mais dans ce cas précis, la prospérité de la planète a décliné sous son nouveau gouvernement.

languages.text: どうやらイデックスは最近、大規模なクーデターに見舞われたようだ。貴族の一族のひとつが権力を掌握し、旧王朝を追放した。そのような陰謀は珍しくない。もっとも、注目すべきは新政権の下でイデックスの繁栄が損なわれていることだ。
languages.original_text: It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

traits.locale_text: どうやらイデックスは最近、大規模なクーデターに見舞われたようだ。貴族の一族のひとつが権力を掌握し、旧王朝を追放した。そのような陰謀は珍しくない。もっとも、注目すべきは新政権の下でイデックスの繁栄が損なわれていることだ。

languages.text: Parece ser que en Idex se produjo un golpe de estado hace poco. Una de sus familias nobles se hizo con el poder, desterrando a la anterior dinastía. Esta clase de conjuras son comunes, aunque cabe notar que Idex ha perdido prosperidad con el cambio de gobierno.
languages.original_text: It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

traits.locale_text: Parece ser que en Idex se produjo un golpe de estado hace poco. Una de sus familias nobles se hizo con el poder, desterrando a la anterior dinastía. Esta clase de conjuras son comunes, aunque cabe notar que Idex ha perdido prosperidad con el cambio de gobierno.

languages.text: 情报显示，艾德克斯最近似乎发生了重大变故，新的贵族家族发动了政变，将原本的执政家族驱逐出境。像这样的宫廷阴谋并不罕见，但值得注意的是，在新任政府的统治下，艾德克斯似乎不再像以前那样繁荣了。
languages.original_text: It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

traits.locale_text: 情报显示，艾德克斯最近似乎发生了重大变故，新的贵族家族发动了政变，将原本的执政家族驱逐出境。像这样的宫廷阴谋并不罕见，但值得注意的是，在新任政府的统治下，艾德克斯似乎不再像以前那样繁荣了。

languages.text: İdex'te yakın zamanda büyük bir darbe yaşanmış. Önde gelen soylu ailelerden biri başa geçerek bir önceki hanedanlıktan olanları gezegenden sürmüş. Her ne kadar alışılagelmiş bir senaryo olsa da yeni yönetimle birlikte gezegenin refahı azalmış.
languages.original_text: It appears Idex recently suffered a major coup. One of its noble families seized power and made outcasts of the former dynasty. Such plots are not uncommon — although, notably, Idex has become less prosperous under the new government.

traits.locale_text: İdex'te yakın zamanda büyük bir darbe yaşanmış. Önde gelen soylu ailelerden biri başa geçerek bir önceki hanedanlığın üyelerini gezegenden sürmüş. Her ne kadar alışılagelmiş bir senaryo da olsa yeni yönetimle birlikte gezegenin refahı azalmış görünüyor.
